rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0001
rows.name:
So you've finally arrived, have you?
Well? Are you here to keep watch,
or aren't you?

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0002
rows.name: Shall I start on guard duty?

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0005
rows.name:
Ahhh, at last, I can get a breather.
Think I've earned myself a drink or two.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0006
rows.name:
It's not looking too good out there.
I'd steel yourself for the worst.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0007
rows.name:
If something's up, give me a shout.
Don't worry, I won't be drinking myself
into a stupor or anything.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0008
rows.name: All right, but be quick about it.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0009
rows.name: Happy hour only lasts so long.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0101
rows.name:
Rex! Glad to see you came!
You're actually a little early.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0102
rows.name:
This is your first time on the Uzushio,
right? Why not have a nosy around?

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0103
rows.name:
Oh, and have you talked much to your
clients yet? I'd suggest you get to know
them before you start the real work.
